sentences.en: After a good night's sleep, Paul said he was raring to go.
sentences.cn: 睡了一夜好觉后，保罗说他已经迫不及待了。

sentences.en: Baker suggested the administration wasn't raring for a fight.
sentences.cn: 贝克暗示行政部门并不急于卷入争斗中。

sentences.en: He is raring to charge into the fray and lay down the law.
sentences.cn: 他急切地想管管这场闹剧，教训他们一顿。

sentences.en: Hopefully we can get everyone back and raring to go ahead of the Man City game.
sentences.cn: 但愿我们能迎来所有人的回归,并渴望他们赶上与曼城的比赛.

sentences.en: Hurry up , dear, the children are already in the car raring to go.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的,快些, 孩子们已坐在车里,早就急不可耐了.

sentences.en: My boy was raring to go to work to help the family.
sentences.cn: 我儿子急于想参加工作以帮家里一把.

sentences.en: Patient: Doc, please give me something that will stimulate, excite and make me raring to fight.
sentences.cn: 患者: 大夫, 给我开点药,能让我感到刺激 、 激动,充满斗志.

sentences.en: Sarah's here and raring to meet you.
sentences.cn: 莎拉来了，她急着要见你。

sentences.en: Serbian striker Marko Pantelic has served his one game suspension and is raring to go again.
sentences.cn: 塞尔维亚前锋马尔科·潘特里奇已缺席了一场比赛,现在他急切地期盼着重新起飞.

sentences.en: She is raring to try out her new skates.
sentences.cn: 她很想试试她那双新溜冰鞋.

sentences.en: The children were raring to get out into the snow.
sentences.cn: 孩子们渴望到外面雪地里去玩.

sentences.en: The children were raring to go.
The horses were raring to have a gallop.
sentences.cn: 这些马都急不可耐地要飞跑起来.

sentences.en: They are ready and raring to go.
sentences.cn: 他们已准备妥当急切想出发[开始].

sentences.en: They will be available for Celtic and Arsenal and they will be raring to go.
sentences.cn: 他俩在对凯尔特人和阿森纳的比赛中非常有用,他们也很渴望去踢比赛.

words.tran_cn: 渴望（rare的ing形式）；用后腿站起

trans.tran_en: If you are raring to do something or are raring for it, you are very eager to do it or very eager that it should happen
